summary: REQ-3 appears implemented via a new /leadership-board route, a new LeadershipBoardPage with the required 2-column layout/headings, and a new "Leadership Board" nav link. REQ-1 appears implemented by generating Activity 2 validation using only heroic/protective/micro-solution fields and by storing only those fields for validation. REQ-2 is clearly implemented for Activity 1 (blocks affirmation generation with an English error containing code "000"); Activity 2â€™s blocking/error text is not fully verifiable due to truncation of the relevant section.

missing_requirements.requirement: Activity 2: When the user requests validation (or generate another), if the input is determined to be Villainous/negative, the UI shows an error containing "000" and does not display a validation result.
missing_requirements.reason: The Activity2ResilientLeadershipPage.tsx diff is truncated right after the villainous-input check begins, so the presence of the required user-facing error text including literal code "000" and the explicit prevention/clearing of any displayed validation result cannot be confirmed from the provided diff summary.

hallucinated_features.description: SessionOutlinePage and SlidesPage changed to placeholder components returning null.
hallucinated_features.reason: These changes are unrelated to REQ-1/REQ-2/REQ-3 (validation blocking and Leadership Board tab/page) and were not requested in the BuildRequest.
